com.netflix.fenzo

Interface ConstraintEvaluator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BalancedHostAttrConstraint, ExclusiveHostConstraint, HostAttrValueConstraint, UniqueHostAttrConstraint

    public interface ConstraintEvaluator
    A constraint evaluator inspects a target to decide whether or not its attributes are satisfactory according to some standard given the current state of task assignments in the system at large. Different constraint evaluators look at different attributes and have different standards for how they make this decision.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  ConstraintEvaluator.Result
      The result of the evaluation of a ConstraintEvaluator.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ConstraintEvaluator.Result evaluate(TaskRequest taskRequest, VirtualMachineCurrentState targetVM, TaskTrackerState taskTrackerState)
      Inspects a target to decide whether or not it meets the constraints appropriate to a particular task.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns the name of the constraint evaluator.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name of the constraint evaluator.
        Returns:
        the name of the constraint evaluator

      • evaluate

        ConstraintEvaluator.Result evaluate(TaskRequest taskRequest,
                                    VirtualMachineCurrentState targetVM,
                                    TaskTrackerState taskTrackerState)
        Inspects a target to decide whether or not it meets the constraints appropriate to a particular task.
        Parameters:
        taskRequest - a description of the task to be assigned
        targetVM - a description of the host that is a potential match for the task
        taskTrackerState - the current status of tasks and task assignments in the system at large
        Returns:
        a successful Result if the target meets the constraints enforced by this constraint evaluator, or an unsuccessful Result otherwise
